thig2.7:2.2: There are countless ways to interpret this phrase. Based on the next paragraph, I think it means "seeking delight in the company of devas" (ie, wanting to be reborn as a deva)
thig2.7:2.5: 'Pattheti' means "aspire towards" - this line appears to mean "I do not aspire to be a deva" (ie, part of the company of devas)
thig2.7:2.6: 'distress' is more accurate than 'sorrow', I think.
